title: Community Gardening
description: Bring your shovel and come spend the day gardening with the community.

title: Harvet Festival
description: The Harvest festival is around the corner! Bring your best veggies and enjoy music, food and drinks!

title: Gardening Tool Exchange
description: Bring your gardening tools that is no longer in use and exchange them for tools you really need.

title: Community Picnic
description: Bring your blanket and join us for a picnic to say goodbye to autumn and hallo to winter.

title: Flower Sale
description: Bring your brightest flowers and sell them or buy seeds for the future.
